channel.title: Nsblockoperation on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Nsblockoperation on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Cancel a NSBlockOperation
item.description: make NSBlockOperation cancelable NSBlockOperation *operation = [[NSBlockOperation alloc] init]; __weak NSBlockOperation *weakOperation = operation; [operation addExecutionBlock:^{ while( ! [weakOperation isCancelled]){ //do something... } }];
